body: :When you move, you can travel across vertical surfaces as if they were floors. If your movement doesn't end on a horizontal surface, you fall at the end of your move unless you are able to remain in place using another ability (such as using the Climb skill to cling to a handhold). The vertical surface must be capable of supporting your weight—for example, you couldn't move across a windowpane or curtain.
name: Wall Run
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/1st-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Wall Run
